A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a great movie\, and is one of my favorites in the whole series. Its long\, sure\, and has some awkward moments. But damn\, this kept me on my toes. It made me laugh\, slip into sadness\, cheer\, and say \"what the F***!\". When I hear my folks talk about the original series\, thats exactly how they felt. So whats the problem? Whatever the case\, this fan gives it a double thumbs up!
